This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.7.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.6.x releases.

==Gameplay==
===New===
{| {{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Multiplayer]]
|
* Player nickname for multiplayer games.
* List of players.
|-
|Select world interface
|[[World seed|Seed]] is displayed after pressing "Edit" on the world selection screen.
|-
|[[Sky]]
|
* Added [[Sun]], [[Moon]], stars, and sunrise and sunset.
** The Moon has different phases.
|}

===Changed===
{| {{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Flying]]
|Add friction when flying in creative mode.
|-
|[[Chat]]
|Unicode characters are now supported.
|-
|[[Server]]
|Multiplayer servers are now displayed at the top of the "play" menu instead of the bottom.
|}
